mapper.insert: INSERT INTO background ( undergrad_university, undergrad_major, undergrad_dual, undergrad_minor, `avg`, gpa, gpa_scale, language_type, language_overall, listening, reading, speaking, writing, gre_v, gre_q, gre_aw, exchange, pub, research, internship, project, rl, user_id, create_date ) VALUES ( #{addBgRequest.undergradUniversity}, #{addBgRequest.undergradMajor}, #{addBgRequest.undergradDual}, #{addBgRequest.undergradMinor}, #{addBgRequest.avg},#{addBgRequest.gpa}, #{addBgRequest.gpaScale}, #{addBgRequest.languageType}, #{addBgRequest.languageOverall}, #{addBgRequest.listening}, #{addBgRequest.reading}, #{addBgRequest.speaking}, #{addBgRequest.writing}, #{addBgRequest.greV}, #{addBgRequest.greQ}, #{addBgRequest.greAw}, #{addBgRequest.exchange}, #{addBgRequest.pub}, #{addBgRequest.research}, #{addBgRequest.internship}, #{addBgRequest.project}, #{addBgRequest.rl}, #{creatorId}, #{createDate} )
